InterEco webpages consist of five tabs, as follows:

1.   study summary

-   may want to standalone from paper, may not

-   aim, objectives

-   taxa, location,

-   locations, spatial layers - option to choose which to plot

-   main findings and conclusions

3\) Interpretation

4\) Generality

5\) Validity
